productSchema.description: Represents a change in the resources related to an RCN within Identity.
productSchema.attribute: Specifies the UUID of the customer accounts feed event that triggered this change
Specifies the URI of the customer accounts feed event that triggered this change
Specifies the space delimited list of accounts associated with the event
Specifies the space delimited list of domains created for the account
Specifies the space delimited list of tenants created for the account
